BlogPost.title: Blog Post
BlogPost.description: Represents a single blog post article.

title.description: The title of the blog post.

author.description: The name of the post's author.

date.description: The publication date of the post.

tags.description: An array of tags or categories.

imageUrl.description: The URL for the post's main image.

imageHint.description: A hint for AI image generation tools.

excerpt.description: A short summary of the blog post.

content.description: The full HTML content of the blog post.

/blogs/{blogId}.description: Stores all the blog post documents.
